'list[itemId="allItems"]':{itemtap:"itemAdding"},'list[itemId="exclusiveItems"]':{itemtap:"itemAdding"},'list[itemId="cartList"]':{itemtap:"itemUpdate"},"button[itemId=removeAllCart]":{tap:"emptyCart"}},refs:{removeAllCartButton:"button[itemId=removeAllCart]"}},itemAdding:function(h,f,g,e,k){var i=k.event.target.type||"";if(i=="button"){var d=k.event.target.previousElementSibling;if(d.value<1){Ext.Msg.alert("Add Item","Please set the quantity !!")}else{var c=Constant.store.cartItems;var f=c.find("productType",e.get("productType"));if(f>=0){var e=c.getAt(f);var m=e.get("qty");console.log("previous qty = "+m+" new qty to be added "+d.value);var l=(parseInt(m)+parseInt(d.value));e.set("qty",l);var j=(l)*(e.get("price"));e.set("subtotal",j)}else{var j=(d.value*e.get("price"));c.add({productType:e.get("productType"),imageUrl:e.get("imageUrl"),price:e.get("price"),qty:d.value,subtotal:(d.value*e.get("price"))})}Constant.num+=parseInt(d.value);Constant.total+=j;var b=Constant.uiComponents.cartTab;b.setBadgeText(Constant.num);var a=Constant.uiComponents.totalAmount;a[0].setTitle("Total Amount : "+Constant.total+"$");d.value=0}}},itemUpdate:function(i,g,h,f,m){var k=m.event.target.type||"";var b=m.event.target.id||"";if(k=="button"&&b=="update"){var e=m.event.target.previousElementSibling;var j=parseInt(f.get("qty"));f.set("qty",e.value);var n=f.get("subtotal");var l=(e.value)*(f.get("price"));f.set("subtotal",l);Constant.total+=(l-n);Constant.num+=(parseInt(e.value)-j);var c=Constant.uiComponents.cartTab;c.setBadgeText(Constant.num);var a=Constant.uiComponents.totalAmount;a[0].setTitle("Total Amount : "+Constant.total+"$")}else{if(k=="button"&&b=="remove"){console.log("remove this item");var j=parseInt(f.get("qty"));var n=f.get("subtotal");Constant.total=(Constant.total-n);Constant.num=(Constant.num-j);var c=Constant.uiComponents.cartTab;c.setBadgeText(Constant.num);var a=Constant.uiComponents.totalAmount;a[0].setTitle("Total Amount : "+Constant.total+"$");var d=Constant.store.cartItems;d.remove(f)}}},emptyCart:function(){console.log("empty cart");var a=Ext.getStore("cartItems");a.removeAll();Constant.num=0;var b=Constant.uiComponents.cartTab;b.setBadgeText(Constant.num);Constant.total=0;var c=Constant.uiComponents.totalAmount;c[0].setTitle("Total Amount : "+Constant.total+"$")
